attributes.action: Regionalize MPs scales or require prospective candidates to declare what salary they will accept if selected ie bid for the work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Voters should be aware of how much they will be expected to pay to be represented by each Candidate and once elected MPs expenses should at least be reviewed by a committee of elected local Councilors who could also award bonuses for attendance and activity particularly regarding their support for local manifesto issues.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
